long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension can help user collecting the data of all papers which cite the target paper.
This can only be used with Microsoft Academic Engine. Find your target paper first, and then download all the information to a CSV file. The information includes title, abstract, authors, labels, institutions, publish year and source link.
Click F5 to reload the page if there is no UResearch option on right click menu.
